spec_data.Name: rubygem-ruby-openid
spec_data.Description:
The Ruby OpenID library, with batteries included.

A Ruby library for verifying and serving OpenID identities.
Ruby OpenID makes it easy to add OpenID authentication to
your web applications.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 27 Jul 2017 05:26:30 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A library for consuming and serving OpenID identities
